readable.title: 1002674143_1b742ab4b8
readable.content: A little girl covered in paint sits in front of a painted rainbow with her hands in a bowl . A little girl is sitting in front of a large painted rainbow . A small girl in the grass plays with fingerpaints in front of a white canvas with a rainbow on it . There is a girl with pigtails sitting in front of a rainbow painting . Young girl with pigtails painting outside in the grass .
